timeline.message: FCCEUD-49 Added `assembly-configuring-repository.adoc` and made some edits to included modules.

timeline.bodyText: Hey @stoobie - looking good! The only change I'd suggest is to the abstract here. Only this first sentence will be considered the abstract, so it should probably be a self-contained, complete sentence. Rather than referring to the next steps using XREFs, how about calling out the general steps. I.e. '...you must configure your documentation repository as a... and create a product and...'
timeline.author: adahms
